Ways of contacting me securely

  • Home

  • Blog

  • Projects

  • Portfolio

  • Contact

  Follow @r3bl_

You can contact me any time on aleksandar@r3bl.me. If you need to share files with me, you can use ownCloud's/Nextcloud's federation. My federated cloud ID is r3bl@nc.r3bl.me (of course, you shouldn't share )

Keep in mind that I prefer receiving encrypted emails, so if you're using PGP/GPG, you can find my public key below.

To be extra safe, you can also download and/or verify my public key using keyservers. My key is available on all (relatively) popular keyservers:

  • keybase.io (you can also verify my Twitter, GitHub, and reddit profiles there)
  • pgp.mit.edu
  • pool.sks-keyservers.net
  • keys.gnupg.net

My public PGP/GPG key

  • Key ID: 2EC04023
  • Creation date: 2016-04-22
  • Algorithm: 4096R
